item.title: CVE-2021-43857|2024-08-04T04:10:17.159Z -- gerapy -- gerapy
item.description: Gerapy is a distributed crawler management framework. Gerapy prior to version 0.9.8 is vulnerable to remote code execution, and this issue is patched in version 0.9.8.
